body.p:
To his Excelency
B Magoffin Gov of Ky,

The undersigned Citizens of Union County would respectfully ask your Excelency to grant a pardon to Vincent Shirley now Confined in the Penitentiary of this State under sentence of the Union Circuit Court
Vincent Shirley is an old man has a family of Eight Children five or Six of whom are quite young and in very limited Circumstances requiring the Care and attention of some one.
We have also learned that he has become afflicted since his Confinement and in all probability will not live untill the expiration of his sentence
We therefore request that you grant him a pardon

James B Crutcher
Sebert, Crutcher
James W. Cissell
Edward Willing
